name: SignatureValidator
description: Contains logic for signature validation. Signatures from wallet contracts assume ERC-1271 support (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1271.md) Notes: Methods are strongly inspired by contracts in https://github.com/0xProject/0x-monorepo/blob/development/.

functionDecorators.name: isValidSignature
functionDecorators.description: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

parameterDecorators.name: _signerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address that should have signed the given hash.

parameterDecorators.name: _hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the EIP-712 encoded data.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Full EIP-712 data structure that was hashed and signed.

parameterDecorators.name: _sig
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer. For non wallet signatures, _sig is expected to be an array tightly encoded as (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType).

returnDecorators.name: isValid
returnDecorators.description: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.
